text: Katamari Forever was like a "Best of Katamari" with most stages being from previous games in the series, and the soundtrack consisting of many remixes. This theme's original with the children sinding is already in this list, but I really like this as well. It just feels nice!
author: SupraDarky

text: I bought Katamari Damacy from a Con I went to a few weeks ago for 10 dollars and it has been a very unique experience to play.  It is unlike any other game I have ever played.
author: Eric C.

text:
The original version of this song actually makes me cry sometimes. It's so viscerally beautiful and optimistic, and yet melancholic at the same time. It hits me in a way most other songs don't.

Amazing song.
author: CitrusFury

text: Eric C. – Katamari Damacy is one of my favourite game series. Pick up We Love Katamari if you can; it's my favourite in the series.
author: CitrusFury

text: +CitrusFury The tree will wither but sprout its pink leaves always.
